item.title: Voice-over search for YouTube videos (10-15 minutes) - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for a talented person to read a script for a YouTube video. The video lasts between 10 and 15 minutes. Your voice will be recorded and overlaid on the video. The script will be provided, and we're looking for a clear, engaging and professional reading.

Responsibilities:

Read the script provided clearly and naturally.
Record your voice with professional audio quality.
Make adjustments and re-record if necessary.

Qualifications:

Previous voice-over or narration experience a plus.
Pleasant, clear and expressive voice.
Access to high quality recording equipment (microphone, recording software, etc.).
Ability to meet deadlines.

How to apply:

Please submit the following:

An audio excerpt of your voice (preferably a narration or script reading).
A brief description of your voice-over experience.
Your rates for a 10-15 minute video.
Your availability to start and finish this project.

Example of video : ( is in french, but the script will be in english ) : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QXxS6q2t4DM&t=67s

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 19, 2024 20:41 UTC
Category: Voice Talent
Skills:Voice-Over, Voice Acting, US English Dialect, Male, Narration
Skills: Voice-Over, Voice Acting, US English Dialect, Male, Narration
Country: France
click to apply

item.title: Full-Time Scriptwriter and Video Editor for Celebrity YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Are you passionate about celebrity culture and entertainment? Do you have experience in creating engaging content for YouTube? We are looking for a talented and dedicated team to join our entertainment YouTube channel that covers celebrity-related stories.

Responsibilities:
Write engaging and compelling scripts based on provided titles and topics.
Source relevant footage, images, and audio clips while adhering to YouTube's copyright policies.
Edit long-form video content to create engaging and high-quality videos.
Ensure videos are optimized for YouTube's algorithm, tags, and descriptions.
Collaborate with the channel owner to align content with the channel's voice and style.
Stay updated with the latest trends and news in the entertainment and celebrity world.
Provide ideas and suggestions for new content and video formats.
Requirements:
Proven experience in scriptwriting and video editing for YouTube.
Strong understanding of YouTube copyright policies and best practices.
Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, etc.).
Ability to source and integrate footage, images, and music legally and effectively.
Excellent storytelling skills and attention to detail.
Ability to meet deadlines and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
Strong communication skills and ability to work collaboratively.
Preferred Qualifications:
Experience in the entertainment or celebrity news niche.
Knowledge of SEO and YouTube algorithm optimization techniques.
Ability to create custom graphics and animations.
Familiarity with social media platforms and content promotion strategies.

If you are interested in this position, please submit the following:

Your resume and/or portfolio showcasing your relevant experience.
Links to YouTube videos you have scripted and/or edited.
A brief cover letter explaining why you are a good fit for this role.
Your availability and expected compensation.
We look forward to seeing your application and potentially welcoming you to our team!

Hourly Range: $11.00-$33.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 20:41 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Documentary, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Documentary, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Short Form Content Editor - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a video editor who has experience in this field and can implement my instructions.

I need 3 videos a day for the next 2 weeks

I am going to be paying $2 per video because the videos I want to receive are easy and fast to make. One video takes me about 5–10 minutes.

For 2 weeks, 3 videos per day will be a total of $84.

In total, I need 42 videos.

I want the videos to be in my style. Meaning the same caption animation from Capcut, or maybe a related viral caption animation, and also a hook with big text in the first 5 seconds of the video.

You can look at my channel here : https://youtube.com/@podcastclipsdayli?si=wN8CcI7ZjiMslTRN

I want you to copy my style 1 to 1

I am also going to upload soon a detailed tutorial on how to create my exact style.


Budget: $84
Posted On: June 19, 2024 20:40 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, English, Copy Editing
Skills: Video Editing, English, Copy Editing
Country: Germany
click to apply

item.title: Need powerful voiceover/audio track - Upwork
item.description:
Please send your flat rate quote for this.

We need a short (under 5 min) appx 175 word voiceover with backing track for a powerful/dramatic message to go along with a programmable LED bracelet visual display regarding the dawn of creation/light.

(see example of the LED bracelets at the link below)
The rough script is written - open to creative improvements (attached).

It’s meant to be VERY impactful.

Concept: The audience of appx 1000 will be wearing interactive LED bracelets like these. Branded with our SHINE event logo. The audio file will be played in the a large, pitch black theatre, with everyone in the crowd wearing an LED bracelet.
We will use them as a visual element to bring the story to life so that the listener is connected to the story and has a place in the narrative. The bracelets are programmable to each seat location and can be synced with the cues in the video to create and amplify the effects of the message. The combined experience is meant to create a powerful experience/ display that interacts with the bracelets and creates a really impactful visual message. Since the event's theme is SHINE and lights are being used to convey this - The goal is to convey how God gave each of us a light. And, that light no matter how small or dim, it can make a difference to many when it shines. And that that light can grow, and spread and be shared and create essentially one small spark can create a blazing flame.
I like the idea of starting with the beginning of creation and how light was referenced in the Bible in the book of Genesis.  There have been many videos created in the past which do a good job of creating an extremely powerful experience when the right, impactful audio and text is partnered with elements of light.

Visual concept: The theatre will start in pitch black

The audio will say
“IN THE BEGINNING, THERE WAS LIGHT” and along with that and just 1 bracelet in the centre of the crowd, will light up - dimly lit and pulsing.  Then we will continue with the audio and corresponding visual bracelet programming to build the message.

Towards the end, when the bracelets are LL illuminated, we want to incorporate some or all of the event’s bible text theme: You are the light of the world. A town built on a hill cannot be hidden. Neither do people light a lamp and put it under a bowl. Instead they put it on its stand, and it gives light to everyone in the house. In the same way, let your light shine before others, that they may see your good deeds and glorify your Father in heaven.

Have a look at the script and keep in mind the concept and let me know if you're a good fit to create impactful audio and provide creative ideas for this. Thanks

LED bracelets:
https://crowdled.net/product/led-wristband/?utm_term=led+bracelet+dmx&utm_campaign=WRLD+%7C+Xyloband+%2B+LED+divers++%7C+Search&utm_source=adwords&utm_medium=ppc&hsa_acc=7009161098&hsa_cam=723019901&hsa_grp=41799251030&hsa_ad=533131195901&hsa_src=s&hsa_tgt=kwd-277834364545&hsa_kw=led+bracelet+dmx&hsa_mt=b&hsa_net=adwords&hsa_ver=3&gad_source=2&gclid=EAIaIQobChMI-fH197_ohgMVD4_CCB2ifQiiEAAYASABEgIpRfD_BwE


Posted On: June 19, 2024 20:27 UTC
Category: Audio Editing
Skills:Audio Production, Audio Editing, Voice-Over
Skills: Audio Production, Audio Editing, Voice-Over
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Expert and Business Marketer - Upwork
item.description:
I am a Content Creator and Coach on Instagram and TikTok who is looking to branch out into long form video on YouTube. I feel very lucky that I get to combine my passion for creation with trying to help aspiring Creators find theirs and achieve their own personal sense of freedom. My team and I are looking for a highly skilled YouTube expert who can not only manage our YouTube page but also assist with business marketing and enhancing customer satisfaction outside of Youtube. The ideal candidate should have a deep understanding of YouTube's algorithms and analytics to optimize our presence and reach on the platform. They should have graphic design skills to create thumbnails and edit my Youtube profile. They should possess strong marketing skills to create compelling content, implement effective SEO strategies, and engage with the audience through comments and community management. Additionally, the candidate should be able to analyze data and provide valuable insights to improve our YouTube performance. An excellent candidate also shows attention to detail. Take a look at my Instagram to get a feel for my style and in your cover letter response to me start with how many Instagram followers my profile currently has. Also tell me why you love Youtube and why you think it is vital that I expand my business onto this platform. Experience in business marketing and customer relationship management is a plus. Skills required: - YouTube channel management - YouTube analytics - Business marketing - Graphic design - SEO optimization - Customer relationship management - Email, SMS, ads marketing. Please include a link to a video you have edited, thumbnails you have designed, profiles you have created, or other work that you feel is relevant to this position. This will become an ongoing position for 1 person, but before I hire that person I will invite a few of you applicants to an invite only trial job here on Upwork. In that job I will provide an edited Youtube video of mine and ask you to take that video, create a thumbnail, title, description, and follow your own process to post the video on my "Youtube" (sent to me). I will award the applicant who I think best captures my style in a Youtube post and accomplishes what I am looking for in social media marketing with the ongoing position. If you are passionate about YouTube and have a proven track record of success, we would love to hear from you.

Hourly Range: $20.00-$40.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 20:26 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Management, YouTube Marketing, Instagram, Lead Generation, Customer Experience, Graphic Design
Skills: Social Media Management, YouTube Marketing, Instagram, Lead Generation, Customer Experience, Graphic Design
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Youtube Videos on minutes basis - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor who can provide editing services for our Youtube videos. The editor will be responsible for editing the first minute of each video to ensure it is engaging and attention-grabbing. The ideal candidate should have experience in video editing and a strong understanding of Youtube video requirements. Attention to detail and the ability to work within deadlines are essential.

Skills required:
- Video editing
- Knowledge of Youtube video requirements
- Attention to detail
- Flexible Timing

This is a small project that requires editing the first minute of each video. We anticipate an ongoing need for video editing services, so there is potential for future projects.

Note: Please share your portfolio and also how many minutes video would you edit for a basic 5$ gig?

Size: Small
Duration: Under 1 month (can be longer depending upon dedication)
Expertise: Fresh/Intermediate

Budget: $5

Category: Video Editing

item.title: Professional Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a  professional video editor that can replicate this style:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1rYE8MfMjnA
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0FyezIe1uGw

You should be able to:
-create map animations like in the video
-find the best matching footage (from articles, news, interviews, youtube, etc.)
-effects, animations and transitions with sound design
-minimal stock footage allowed (5-10% max)

Payout will be per edited minute, depending on your skills, please include your rate.
Videos will be around 10-15 minutes, 1-2 per week.
A short 30-60 seconds test will be required after your portolofio review.

If your skills don't match up to the example videos please do not apply, we are only looking for high quality editors.

item.title: Video retouching - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

I have several video segments that need editing.

I am looking for someone to complete the first two segments.

For the first video (Edit1.mp4), the visible side needs to be replaced.
I have outlined the area in a separate photo so you can see which part I mean.

In the second video (Edit2.mp4), something green is reflecting, with text and graphics on it.
These need to be edited so that only the green reflection remains in that area.
The goal is to make the advertisement unrecognizable.

Please only contact me if you are confident in your ability to complete these tasks with high quality.
If you have done very similar work before, you are welcome to send me the results so I can see your quality.
However, this is not mandatory. :)

Please let me know your price expectations and the estimated time for completing these tasks after you have reviewed them.

item.ns0:encoded:
Hello,

I have several video segments that need editing.

I am looking for someone to complete the first two segments.

For the first video (Edit1.mp4), the visible side needs to be replaced.
I have outlined the area in a separate photo so you can see which part I mean.

In the second video (Edit2.mp4), something green is reflecting, with text and graphics on it.
These need to be edited so that only the green reflection remains in that area.
The goal is to make the advertisement unrecognizable.

Please only contact me if you are confident in your ability to complete these tasks with high quality.
If you have done very similar work before, you are welcome to send me the results so I can see your quality.
However, this is not mandatory. :)

Please let me know your price expectations and the estimated time for completing these tasks after you have reviewed them.

item.title: Launch Video - Upwork
item.description:
Task Description:

Create a 15-20 second sizzle reel using provided product clips to launch our new feature. The video should be dynamic, engaging, and effectively communicate the benefits and features of our Self Sign Up. Include the following text overlays, must follow style guide (attached)

- "Introducing Mentorly Self Sign Up!"
- "Try Mentorly for free - explore all of our features."
- "Smart Matching, Resources, mentor-mentee invites and tracking."
- "Head to Mentorly.com to start building your automated mentorship program."

Ensure the video incorporates engaging transitions, background music, and the provided clips.

**Note to Freelancer:** You'll create this from a variety of product videos and GIFs. You'll also create overlay text similar to the overlay text used in our podcast interviews. Deliver the final video in a high-resolution format suitable for various digital platforms.

Example of one we'd like it to feel like: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ja1bvbhdb6c


Mentorly Video clips to work with: https://www.loom.com/share/c1cd9bc2aa164bb5b164df86a4133b61?sid=23cc0966-9f0b-4dbf-ad16-88a5313c0cc6

Demo (dont show my face but you ca work with this video for product shots) : https://www.loom.com/share/ddbcf1cb5c19419093a15e217e61136e

Other video clips attached as files.

Product gifs/ shots: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1PQdAQqGzPNIXFG0fmpKmT4QdFF1iD5Xa?usp=drive_link

Pls  can use any of the GIFS to add brand/ animation feeling: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/13RHe-kRjtD7L2gsb-9623LFE1RyYI62n
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1ZYOBl2O-A5n_GZ7d_Rhln0scDI65kftI

You can use any part of this video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DO0D1wjExNA

Budget: $200

we need 2 videos for our watches website.

https://laventure.swiss/en
We are not sure if the watch is real, a rendering or an hybrid...would be good to know.
Second video is more creative and infinity zooming will be the core of it.
We will have the final prototype of the watch in July but if we can do something already with a rendering, that would be great.
